statement.p: The diagram below shows a triangle inscribed in a rectangle. The rectangle has width \displaystyle{7.00} m and height \displaystyle{4.00} m. One side of the triangle is a long side of the rectangle. The other triangle sides have lengths \displaystyle{4.47} m and \displaystyle{6.40} m.
What is the area of the shaded, inscribed triangle? m²
What is the area of the rectangle? m²
What is the area of the unshaded parts of the rectangle? m²
